english.segment1: Bring rivers in this wasteland. Clouds into this sky. Bring springs of life into the wells that have been run dry
english.segment2: Rise up in this city. Gather in this light. Fall down on your people. Your glory and your life
english.segment3: Rain. Lord we thirst for water. Rain. We are desert Land. Rain. On your sons and daughters. Rain. Bring your rain again
english.segment4: Speak dreams into this water. And vision to this land. That oceans be divided. And bring forth life again
english.segment5: Rise up in this city. Gather in this light. Fall down on your people. Your glory and your life
english.segment7: Let the tide roll in. Washing over our lives. Let your water fall again
english.segment8: Bring rivers in this wasteland. Clouds into the sky
english.segment10: Bring your rain again. Let your water fall down. Bring your rain again now. (repeat)
